metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7436 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FreeXL before 1.0.5. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in a pointer dereference of the parse_SST function. It was discovered that FreeXL did not properly handle certain input, resulting in a beap-based buffer over-read. If a user were tricked into opening a malicious Excel spreadsheet, FreeXL could potentially leak sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreexl1 - 1.0.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freexl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-1ubuntu0.1').
